name: Imperial Rajasthan
description:
The majestic forts and glittering places of Rajasthan since long have attracted tourists across the globe. For a good reason too, it is here that you can get transported to the glorious days of royalty as most of the buildings have been retrieved and converted into heritage hotels.

Through this tour, witness the unparalleled sights of massive forts and experience palaces that spell grandiose. Discover hidden secrets along the quaint lanes of the state. Get a feel of the rustic life and warm hospitality with village tours.
